name: Duel of the Necromancers
description:
Prototype of a local multiplayer game developed in a week by Pancake Team.

CREDITS

Game Design: Álex Villalta
2D Art: Clara B. Martínez & Antonio Caamaño
Programming: Miguel López
Music & Sounds: Gerard Bosch

INSTRUCTIONS

You must conquest 2 of the 3 central orbs with your ghosts and avoid that your opponent reach it first.  To do that, you can shoot the enemy ghosts or stunt your rival with a direct impact.
